ygData.subject: Re: General for Evil races
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, life is harder for the dark races.  That little notice you get on character creation screen isn t for nothing.  I used to spend a very long time zoning
ygData.messageBody:
Well, life is harder for the dark races. That little
notice you get on character creation screen isn't for
nothing. I used to spend a very long time zoning as
well and I upped my RAM from 32 to 96 mb. It's much
better now, although I've already gotten used to the
speed increase and have to remind myself how much
slower it used to be.

I like hunting in souther ro. The DE merchants there
give me better prices than either Oggok or Grobb.

Atrocity

--- Cronik <rich.hitz@...> wrote:
> Brian,
>
> I know you said you would not answer non-SK related
> email, but this one does
> in a way.
>
> Why is it that only the evil races must zone to get
> to a merchant? Every
> other zone, with the exception of Dungeons, has at
> least one merchant in it
> except the newbie zone of an evil race.
> Everfrost has the merchants in the tunnel
> Steamfont has many merchants
> Butcherblock has many merchants
> Greater Fay has the entire city of Kelethin open to
> Wood and High elves
> Lesser Fay has the Ranger camp
> Qeynos Hills has the house in the middle
> Misty Thicket has the halfling huts
> The Commonlands...
> Kithicor...
> The Karanas ....
>
> Why did Verant think it necessary to FORCE a
> character of an evil race to
> zone into a city to sell loot from the associated
> newbie zone? That has
> been bugging me for quite a bit. I hate having to
> zone to sell. The major
> factor here is that it takes me 2-2.5 minutes to
> zone one way. If it only
> took me 30 seconds like it does my wife, I may not
> have thought it a big
> deal. It may be an oversight by Verant, but I don't
> think it is a "fair"
> way of doing things. The all-or-none principle
> comes to mind here.
> End of rant.
>
> Please respond to this one Brian, even if it is a "I
> don't know".
> Anyone out there think this is worthy of a Petition?
> Thanks.
>
> --
> Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
> Servant of Thule the Pain Bringer
> 15th Season Troll SK
> Bertoxxulous
>
